actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The trapsmith uses Makeshift Trap then makes one Dagger or Spare Part attack.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Spare Part
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack:+5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage or slashing damage (the trapsmith's choice).

actions.name: Makeshift Trap
actions.desc: The kobold trapsmith cobbles together a quick trap with materials at hand and throws it at a point on the ground it can see within 30 feet of it. The trapsmith chooses one of the following traps. Each creature in the trap's area must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or suffer the trap's effects.

special_abilities.name: Improvised Tools
special_abilities.desc: The kobold trapsmith can use any Tiny objects at hand to pick locks and disarm traps, as if any such object was part of a set of thieves' tools. It is proficient in using Tiny objects in this way. In addition, the trapsmith has advantage on ability checks to pick locks and disarm traps.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The kobold trapsmith has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the trapsmith's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: While in sunlight, the kobold trapsmith has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
